headline: Dogfooding Magic Transit by DDoSing our Austin office
keywords: Magic Transit, DDoS, Attacks, Texas, Austin, Life @ Cloudflare, Speed & Reliability
description: It was a scorching Monday on July 22 as temperatures soared above 37°C (99°F) in Austin, TX, the live music capital of the world. Only hours earlier, the last crowds dispersed from the historic East 6th Street entertainment district.
